channel.title: New home start location issue [pi]
channel.description: Ok so when i changed my home area to a new one.... when you start it shows the new area but instantly moves the player to the old area. Anyone know why cuz i dont want edge as my home anymore. Thanks

item.title: New home start location issue [pi]
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

open up your server files, and in the top right hand corner there is a search bar. Click in it.
In the game, go to the home teleport, type in ::mypos and you’ll see your
x coord and y coord. Search those in that search bar i mentioned and change them to the new coords you want.

Read full topic

item.title: New home start location issue [pi]
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

Make a new character get the coords of it then search those coords in your server folder.

Read full topic
